price: 36. To boye bayebisaki ye te na ntina ya makomi ya Mûssa?
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am lam yunabba bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā
